com.punchline.javalib.entities.components.render

Interface Renderable

  • All Superinterfaces:
    Component
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    AnimatedSprite, Animation, Sprite

    public interface Renderable
extends Component
    Base class for all components that can be rendered.
    Author:
    Nathaniel

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void draw(com.badlogic.gdx.graphics.g2d.SpriteBatch spriteBatch, float deltaSeconds)
      Draws this component.
      void setOrigin(com.badlogic.gdx.math.Vector2 origin)
      Sets the origin that should be used when rotating this component, in relation to its bottom left corner.
      void setPosition(com.badlogic.gdx.math.Vector2 position)
      Sets the position where this component should be rendered.
      void setRotation(float degrees)
      Sets the rotation at which the component should be rendered.
      void setScale(float scale)
      Sets the scale that should be applied when this component is drawn.

        float deltaSeconds)
        Draws this component.
        Parameters:
        spriteBatch - The SpriteBatch which will be used.
        deltaSeconds - The amount of seconds since the last time this component was drawn.
